My Work

Check out some of my projects!

Maze Game

A fun and interactive maze game built with HTML, CSS and Javascript. Using the Matter.JS library, try this physics-filled challenging game on your computer!

View on GitHub Live Demo

SmartBrain

Using a Machine Learning API, this full-stack application allows you to paste an image URL and identify the face within the image accurately. This app utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, MySQL, Node, Express along with production grade authentication to register or sign-in existing users!

View on GitHub Live Demo

Movie Fight

Ever been stuck debating on which movie is better? This app uses JavaScript along with a open-source API to allow you to compare movies! Built with a auto-complete widget, this app will allow you to select a movie and compare its most important stats, smartly color coding the higher of the two!

View on GitHub Live Demo

Global Weather App

Everyone needs a simple, easy-to-use and user-friendly weather app! Simply type in the city you want the information on, and this app will produce it's latest data without any of the extra gimmicks. Built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript along with a open-source API, this app is simple and fun to use!

View on GitHub Live Demo

Client Side Authentication

Using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Node.Js, I created a sample client-side authentication page. With pure Javascript, it checks for the appropriate inputs, throwing color coded errors in real-time. This application could be applied to any project involving a registration or sign-in feature.

View on GitHub Live Demo

Secret Message App

This simple yet useful app built with JavaScript allows you to share a secret message through a generated link. Simply type in a message, click create and send the link to anyone!

View on GitHub Live Demo
